      Released with 3.1: store default font size in annotation.
      static int VERSION_OLD
      Old type annotation - font is system font (inconsistent layout).

      • getVersion

        public final int getVersion()
        Save-Version of this annotation. "Old" annotations used the system default font, newer ones will use hardcoded font families.
        Returns:
        the version, usually one of AnnotationData#VERSION_XYZ.
        Since:
        3.0

      • getDefaultFontSize

        public final int getDefaultFontSize()
        Return the default font size for this annotation, or -1 if size from pref page should be used. (For old versions only.)
        Returns:
        the default font size for this annotation, or -1 if size from pref page should be used
        Since:
        3.1

      • copyFrom

        public void copyFrom(AnnotationData otherData,
                     boolean includeBounds)
        Copy content, styles, position from the argument.
        Parameters:
        otherData - To copy from.
        includeBounds - Whether to also update x, y, width, height. If false, it will only a copy the text with its styles
